title: Deploy Draft Version 4 to Live Network

requirements.text: Deploy the current Draft Version 4 implementation with larger GameCard images and click-to-play video trailers to the live Internet Computer network
acceptanceCriteria: Application is deployed and accessible on the Internet Computer mainnet
All GameCard components display with the increased image dimensions
Video trailers require click interaction to play and do not autoplay
All existing functionality (authentication, admin panel, game catalog, user profiles) works correctly on the live deployment

constraints: Preserve all existing functionality including authentication, admin game management, and user profile features
Maintain the current database schema and backend logic without modifications
Keep all frontend immutable paths unchanged (hooks/useInternetIdentity, hooks/useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond what exists in Draft Version 4
Modifying the visual design or styling
Changing any backend data models or API endpoints
